creator: Terry.Rosenbaum@gmail.com
text:
DocumentImpl.importNode when performing deep import
is recursively importing namespace definitions
into all nodes.

Result is XML like:

<p:person
	xmlns:p='http://example.net/person'
	xmlns:src='http://xml.apache.org/xindice/Query'
	src:col='/db/testing/current' src:key='doc3'>

    <p:first 
		xmlns:p='http://example.net/person'
		xmlns:src='http://xml.apache.org/xindice/Query'>Sally</p:first>
    <p:last
		xmlns:p='http://example.net/person'
		xmlns:src='http://xml.apache.org/xindice/Query'>Smith</p:last>
    <p:phone
		xmlns:p='http://example.net/person'
		xmlns:src='http://xml.apache.org/xindice/Query'
		p:type=\work\>555-345-6789</p:phone>

</p:person>

Instead of:

<p:person xmlns:p='http://example.net/person'
	xmlns:src='http://xml.apache.org/xindice/Query'
	src:col='/db/testing/current' src:key='doc3'>

    <p:first>Sally</p:first>
    <p:last>Smith</p:last>
    <p:phone p:type=\work\>555-345-6789</p:phone>

</p:person>

A unit test has been submitted in bug 23595.

creator: kevinoneill@apache.org
text:
Applied patches. There was some difficulty doing this (alot had to be done
manually) as the patches where not supplied in diff -u format from the root of
the project.
